result.arabic_text: قَالَ رَبِّ ٱجۡعَل لِّيٓ ءَايَةٗۖ قَالَ ءَايَتُكَ أَلَّا تُكَلِّمَ ٱلنَّاسَ ثَلَٰثَ لَيَالٖ سَوِيّٗا
result.translation: 10. (Zakariya) wuxuu yidhi: “Rabbiyow ii yeel calaamo.” Wuxuu yidhi: “Calaamad- daadu waa inaadan la hadli kareyn dadka saddex habeen oo israacsan adoo fayow.”
